1:
My dinosaur and I
look at my birds in the sky.
2:
My birds and I
meet Chimpanzee in the tree.
3:
My chimpanzee and I
play with my giraffes on the hill.
4:
My giraffes and I
make monkey balls from clay.
5: My monkey and I eat bananas with Gorilla every day.
6: My gorilla and monkey fear Tortoise in every way.
7:
Tortoise and I
go home very slowly with Snake.
8:
Snake and I
love to hiss and sing songs by the lake.
9:
My entire family and I
live together in great happiness!
